name: The Arboretum
description:
The Arboretum is a story about dating, growing up, and our relationships to our past and future selves. Although mostly linear, it is also an exploration of what choice and consequences mean, both in life and in an interactive medium. Rock, Paper, Shotgun called The Arboretum "a gentle and deftly-written text adventure."

The Arboretum was originally published at Unwinnable.
